attributes.action: change the petition system to make sure those who do not agree can counter-sign them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all find it irritating when we see petitions that have many followers, but we downright disagree with. There should be some sort of system allowing people not only to sign petitions in agreement, but also to sign them in disagreement.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
